Forward Service.
Provides auto-routing of DICOM objects that are received by the DICOM Storage Service to remote DICOM applications.

Forwarding Rules can be defined in one or several XSLT stylesheets under the configuration directory (s.attribute ConfigDirectory). org.dcm4chex.archive.dcm.movescu.ForwardService2 The default constructor ForwardService2 Directory where configuration files defining forwarding rules are located: if XSL stylesheet "forward.xsl" exists in this directory or in a sub-directory equal to the AE Title of the Storage SCU, received Series will be forwarded to one or several destinations according the forwarding rules in the stylesheet.
